title: Make clamp twice differentiable
body_html:
Hi,

thank you for pytorch!

This pull request attempts to implement twice differentiability for Variable.clamp.

As this is my first pull request with autograd (or pytorch for that matter), I may or may not know what I'm doing.
I appreciate your feedback.

Best regards

Thomas
